solution_line_template: Since a dozen is equal to {dozen}, then two dozens are equal to {dozen} x {num_dozens}= <<{dozen}*{num_dozens}={two_dozens_pens}>>{two_dozens_pens}.
Thus, Bruno will have a total of {two_dozens_pens} + {half_dozen_pens} = <<{two_dozens_pens}+{half_dozen_pens}={total_pens}>>{total_pens} pens.
